verses.content: “In hmêlmahai do dinga in suoka sakawrhai le tawlailîr- hai dâm, mipuihai dâm, nangni nêka tam in hmuin, anni chu in ṭi ding a ni nawh; Aigupta rama inthawka ṭhuoi suoktu cheu LALPA in Pathien chu in kuomah a um sih a.
Chun, in indo ding hnai chun thiempu chun mipuihai chu va pan sienla, be sienla,
an kuomah, ‘Aw Israel mihai, hre ro khai, tuhin chu in hmêlmahai in do ding a ni tah a, zâm naw unla, ṭi naw unla, inthin bawk naw ro, anni chu ṭi dêr naw ro;
nangni sandam ding cheua, in hmêlmahai thawpêk ding cheua in kuoma um pei chu LALPA in Pathien a ni sih a,’ ti raw se.
Chun, hotuhai chun mipuihai kuomah, ‘In thar bâwla lân hlân lo in um am? A inah kîr nâwk el raw se, indonaa chun thi hlau a ta, mi dangin inhlân rawi an tih.
Grêp huon siema a ra la sawr lo in um am? A in tieng kîr nâwk el raw se; indonaah thi hlau a ta, mi dangin sawr râwi an tih.
Nuhmei huola la neilo in um am? A in tieng kîr nâwk el raw se, indonaah thi hlau a ta, mi dangin nei râwi an tih,’ ti raw hai se.
Hotuhai chun mipuihai kuoma chun, ‘Ṭi le zâm in um am? A in tieng kîr el raw se, a unauhai lungril chu ama lungril ang chun intuihmang ve râwi a tih,’ la ti pei raw se.
Chun, hotuhaiin mihai kuoma thu an hril zo chun mipuihai hmaṭhuoitu ding sipai hotuhai an ruot ding a nih.
“Thaw dinga khuo in va hnai pha chun inremna thu hang hril phawt unla.
An lo inrempui cheu a, an lo inpêk el chun chutaka mi umhai po po chu sinthawa in ruoi ding nîng an ta, in rawng bâwl an tih.
An lo inrempui nuom naw cheu a, an lo do cheu ruok chun inhuol in ta;
LALPA in Pathienin in kuta a pêk pha cheu chun chutaka pasal po po chu kâwlhnâmin in sukhlum vawng ding a nih.

Nuhmei le an nauhai, ranhai le khuoa thil um hrim hrim hai ruok chu chutaka râllâk thilhaiah in chanpuol dingin lâng in tih; chun, LALPA in Pathienin a pêk cheu in hmêlmahaia inthawka râllâk thilhai chu neiin sawr in tih.
“Hi laia hnamhai khuohai ni lo, in umnaa inthawka khaw hlahai po po chu chuong ang chun in thaw pei ding a nih.
LALPA in Pathienin hluo dinga a pêk cheu laia hnamhai khuohaia ruok hin chu hring taphawt chu iengkhawm in hla ding a ni nawh a,
Hit mihai, Amor mihai, Kanaan mihai, Periz mihai, Hiv mihai, Jebus mihai dâm chu LALPA in Pathienin thu a pêk cheu angin in sukbohmang vawng ding a nih;
an pathienhai chunga an thaw hlak thilhai thil tirdakumhai po po chu an inchûktir nawna ding cheuin; chuong naw chun LALPA in Pathien chungah thil suksuol râwi in tih.

“Lâk tuma in thaw khuo chu sâwttak in inhuol khawmin chuong laia thinghai chu hreipuiin in phûr ding a ni nawh. In fâk ding a na, in phûr ding a ni nawh. Thing chu mi- hriem am an ni in inhuol ding chu?
A ra fâk naw mi a nih ti in hriet thing ruok chu suksein phûr in ta, a dotuhai cheu khuo chu a siet hma- khat chu kulin in inhuon khum ding a nih.
